markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eye of Fortune](/Equipment.aspx?ID=435)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 610 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 2,700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Adherents of [Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=6), god of the hunt, create these magical eye patches. An eye of fortune has a jeweled eye symbol on its front, allowing you to magically see through the eye patch as though it were transparent.

<document level="2" id="action-252" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Eye of Fortune
